trans-unit.source: Balance
trans-unit.target: Balance

trans-unit.source: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.
trans-unit.target: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

trans-unit.source: Berserk
trans-unit.target: Berserk

trans-unit.source: Cast Berserk only before the combat damage step. Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.
trans-unit.target: Cast Berserk only before the combat damage step. Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.

trans-unit.source: Channel
trans-unit.target: Channel

trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {1} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {1} to your mana pool.

trans-unit.source: To some mages, the meaning of life is less important than how much is left.
trans-unit.target: To some mages, the meaning of life is less important than how much is left.

trans-unit.source: Gifts Ungiven
trans-unit.target: Gifts Ungiven

trans-unit.source: Search your library for four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.source: Goblin Lackey
trans-unit.target: Goblin Lackey

trans-unit.source: Whenever Goblin Lackey deals damage to a player, you may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Whenever Goblin Lackey deals damage to a player, you may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: At the first sign of enemy scouts, Jula grinned and strapped on his diplomacy helmet.
trans-unit.target: At the first sign of enemy scouts, Jula grinned and strapped on his diplomacy helmet.

trans-unit.source: Kird Ape
trans-unit.target: Kird Ape

trans-unit.source: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
trans-unit.target: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

trans-unit.source: Apes can be gentle, contemplative beasts—but context is everything.
trans-unit.target: Apes can be gentle, contemplative beasts—but context is everything.

trans-unit.source: Lotus Petal
trans-unit.target: Lotus Petal

trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

trans-unit.source: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."
trans-unit.target: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."

trans-unit.source: Mystical Tutor
trans-unit.target: Mystical Tutor

trans-unit.source: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

trans-unit.source: The student searches the world for meaning. The master finds worlds of meaning in the search.
trans-unit.target: The student searches the world for meaning. The master finds worlds of meaning in the search.

trans-unit.source: Necropotence
trans-unit.target: Necropotence

trans-unit.source: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.
trans-unit.target: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

trans-unit.source: Summoners of efreeti remember only the power of command, never the sting of regret.

trans-unit.source: Unlike previous conflicts, the war between Urza and Mishra made Dominaria itself a casualty of war.

trans-unit.source: Tinker

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast Tinker, sacrifice an artifact. Search your library for an artifact card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.source: "What separates us from mere beasts is the capacity for self-improvement."

trans-unit.source: Trinisphere
trans-unit.target: Trinisphere

trans-unit.source: As long as Trinisphere is untapped, each spell that would cost less than three mana to cast costs three mana to cast.
trans-unit.target: As long as Trinisphere is untapped, each spell that would cost less than three mana to cast costs three mana to cast.

trans-unit.source: Designed to restrain petty thoughts, but used to repress entire empires.
trans-unit.target: Designed to restrain petty thoughts, but used to repress entire empires.
